mapper.select: SELECT country_name AS countryName, group_name AS groupName, organization_name organizationName, company_name AS companyName, project_name AS projectName, DATE_TRUNC( 'HOUR', gmt_create ) AS time, date_part( 'YEAR', gmt_create ) AS year, date_part( 'MONTH', gmt_create ) AS month, date_part( 'DAY', gmt_create ) AS day, date_part( 'HOUR', gmt_create ) AS hour, COUNT ( id ) AS request, COUNT ( user_id ) AS activeUser FROM log_info WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY country_name,group_name,organization_name,company_name,project_name,time,year,month,day,hour

SELECT country_name AS countryName, group_name AS groupName, organization_name organizationName, company_name AS companyName, project_name AS projectName, DATE_TRUNC( 'HOUR', gmt_create ) AS time, date_part( 'YEAR', gmt_create ) AS year, date_part( 'MONTH', gmt_create ) AS month, date_part( 'DAY', gmt_create ) AS day, date_part( 'HOUR', gmt_create ) AS hour, COUNT ( id ) AS request, COUNT ( user_id ) AS activeUser FROM log_info WHERE 1 = 1 AND gmt_create > CURRENT_DATE - 1 AND gmt_create < CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY country_name,group_name,organization_name,company_name,project_name,time,year,month,day,hour
